image.invalid-format:
Incorrect image format.
Please select an image format file.

invalid.empty: The mandatory field value is missed
invalid.format: The mal-formed value is filled in the field
invalid.min-range: The input value is under the minimum requried
invalid.max-range: The input value is over the maximum required
invalid.min-length: The length of the input string is less than the required
invalid.max-length: The length of the input string is more than the required
invalid.range: The end value of the range value is less than the start value
invalid.min-array-element: Less than the minimum number of entries has been entered
invalid.max-array-element: More than the maximum number of input items has been entered
invalid.unique-value: A duplicate value has been entered, so please check it.
invalid.access-user:
This information is provided only to registered members.
After registering as a member, please use it through login.
invalid.access-menu:
You are trying to access a function that you do not have access rights to.
Please check the permission and sharing status
invalid.access-app:
You are trying to access software information for which you do not have access rights.
Please check your permission and sharing status
invalid.access-resource:
You are trying to access information on a resource you do not have access rights to.
Please check your permission and sharing status
invalid.access-service:
You are trying to access service information for which you do not have access rights.
Please check the permission and sharing status
invalid.alert:
There is an error in your form field.
Please check your input fields.

alert.no-item-selected:
There is no selected item.
Please select an item.
